app.name: Compease
app.description: A modern platform for managing employee compensation with ease

hero.title: Compensation Management Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Streamline your salary planning, benchmarking, and equity distribution with our powerful platform.

feature1.title: Smart Analytics
feature1.description: Gain insights into your compensation data with powerful analytics and reporting tools.

feature2.title: Market Benchmarking
feature2.description: Compare your compensation packages against industry standards in real-time.

feature3.title: Easy Integration
feature3.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing HR systems and payroll providers.
